issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of a spear stabbing a pig with motto AUT MORS AUT VITA DECORA (Either death or an honorable life).
issue_obverse_legend_s: THE UNITED STATES | FOUR DOLLARS | FOUR DOLLARS. THIS Bill entitles the Bearer to receive Four Spanish milled Dol-lars, or the Value there-of in Gold or Silver, ac-cording to a Resolution of CONGRESS, passed at Philadelphia, May 20, 1777. FOUR DOLLARS.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Nature print of three maple fruit leaves
issue_reverse_legend_s: FOUR DOLLARS. | Printed by HALL and SEL-LERS. 1777.
